t offended due that little one's speech

  Silence::

  She didn't n=
ot move.  She kept her blaster focused on Megatron.
  "Explain Rodimus? Wha=
t?! How can this bot possibly on our side? He's a
  Decepticon! You can not=
 let your thought processes think for a single
  nano that one of his kind =
can be trusted! Eons have proven they are
  simply incapable of keeping any=
 type of honor. No! He is a Decepticon.
  He is not worth the value of slag=
 metal!"  She kept her optics on him
  the whole time. "I know of a bot who=
 trusted a Decepticon once. He now
  is nothing more than atoms scattered a=
cross the stars. They can not
  even conceive the concept of honor Rodimus.=
 No Decepticon has proven
  themselves worthy of our trust."

ow all of the relevent knowledge needed to resolve our

ire untill he moved.
